dc.title: U.S. Bureau of Economic Analysis (BEA) - bea.gov Home Page
dc.description: Official Bureau of Economic Analysis website. Source of US economic statistics including national income and product accounts (NIPAs), gross domestic product (GDP) and related measures of national, regional, industry and international accounts.
